contact.get-information: For more information or a quote: Contact me now!
contact.get-information-text: Would you like detailed information or a customized quote? Look no further! You've come to the right place. I'm here to answer all your questions and provide you with the information you need. Don't hesitate to contact me using the form below, and you'll receive a quick and comprehensive reply.
contact.more-info-text: You can contact me at any time during these hours, and I'll get back to you as soon as possible. I understand how important it is to receive a quick response when you have specific questions or needs, which is why I am committed to being responsive and attentive to your requests.
contact.need-called-backt-text: If you prefer to be called back rather than contacting me directly, you can also fill in the form below with the following information
contact.summary: Once I have received this information, I will contact you as soon as possible to discuss your request and provide you with the necessary information. Please don't hesitate to contact me now. I'm here to help you and answer any questions you may have. Your satisfaction is my priority, and I'm committed to providing you with quality service and clear, precise answers.
contact-form.error.email-pattern: The e-mail address format is invalid.
contact-form.error-message: An error has occurred, please try again in a few moments.
contact-form.name: Your first & last name
contact-form.rgpd: By submitting this form, I agree that the information collected may be used in connection with the request for information and the commercial relationship that may result *
contact-form.rgpd-phone: By submitting this form, I agree that the information collected may be used for the purposes of the callback request.
footer.follow-us-social: Follow us on our social networks
footer.schedule: Monday to Sunday, 10:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m.
hero.contact-01: Turn your vision into reality with our expertise
hero.contact-02: Contact me now to discuss your project!
home.application-text: The graphical design of the website is created in accordance with your preferences, followed by development using the latest programming standards. Regular progress monitoring is ensured to guarantee a successful implementation.
home.complete-range: DevOne offers a complete range of services to meet your needs:
home.contact-me-project: Contact me for a successful project
home.contact-me-project-text: Do you have a project in mind? Don't wait any longer, contact me now! I'd be delighted to answer all your questions and discuss your project with you.
home.experience-expertise: Experience and Expertise for Quality Solutions
home.experience-expertise-text: With my expertise in website creation, I'm your trusted partner in turning your vision into reality. My daily practice of technology watch enables me to offer you the best solutions. Thanks to my successful professional experience, I'm able to tailor the best advice and meet your expectations precisely and transparently. In the event of difficulties, I can offer you fast, efficient support.
home.experts-passion-text-01: My name is Denis, I'm {{age}} years old and I'm passionate about IT. I have always been attracted to the field of digital and technological tools. This is why I decided to create my company, DevOne.
home.experts-passion-text-02: With many years of successful experience as an application designer and developer, my mission is to co-create your project. I put my skills and know-how at your disposal throughout development and implementation, to ensure outstanding results.
home.mission-01: My Mission: To co-create your project for
home.mission-text: My mission is to co-create your project with you. As an experienced developer, I put my skills and know-how at your disposal throughout the development and realization of your project, to guarantee outstanding results.
home.preliminary-study-text: In-depth understanding of your needs, objectives, design, and desired features for the website creation project. This step establishes a strong foundation for personalized recommendations and an adapted development strategy.
home.promotionnal-marketing-text: Discover our promotional marketing service! Create customized t-shirts, sweaters and goodies in your brand's image. Boost your visibility and leave a lasting impression with our unique and creative products. Stand out from the crowd!
home.recommendations-text: Based on an in-depth understanding of your needs, objectives, design and desired functionalities, customized recommendations are drawn up, including site architecture, functionalities, suitable technologies, and a detailed development strategy.
home.redesign-website-text: Give your outdated site a facelift, taking into account ergonomics, security, SEO and conversion rates.
home.transform-reality: Turn your vision into reality with DevOne
home.turn-on-vision: Website creation: Turn Your Vision into Reality
home.turn-on-vision-text: Selecting a qualified and competent developer to create your website is of paramount importance. I'll be there to support you and bring your project to life.
home.vision-ocean: Don't let your vision get lost in the digital ocean. Trust DevOne to create the website that will propel you to success. Contact me today to discuss your project and start this amazing adventure together.
home.website-creation-text: Present your activities, products and services, create a direct link with your customers, increase your sales, sell online, reinforce your reputation, etc.
services.website-creation.benefits-01-de: As a developer, I'm constantly faced with new challenges in a world where technology is rapidly evolving. That's why I'm constantly self-training to stay on top of the latest trends and best practices. When you choose to work with me, you benefit from the expertise of a passionate professional who invests fully in every project to deliver results that live up to your expectations.
services.website-creation.benefits-01-ti: A committed independent: Always ready to take on new challenges
services.website-creation.benefits-02-de: As part of my offer, I commit to carrying out monthly updates and backups of your site. This ensures that your site remains optimized, secure and runs smoothly. You don't have to worry about the technical aspects, because I'll make sure your site is always up to date and operational. After 12 months, you also have the option of continuing to benefit from this backup and maintenance service for a monthly fee of €29.99, payable annually.
services.website-creation.benefits-02-ti: Backup and maintenance: Protect your site and ensure its performance
services.website-creation.benefits-03-de: I'm here to support and help you with all the work you need to do on your website. Whether it's for modifications, new features or technical questions, you can count on my unlimited e-mail support. I'm committed to providing you with efficient, responsive support at all times. Rest assured, I'm here to help you make your website a success.
services.website-creation.benefits-03-ti: Unlimited e-mail assistance: responsive support at your disposal
services.website-creation.benefits-title: The additional benefits I offer you free of charge
services.website-creation.catalog-descri: If you want to present your products in detail, but don't want to sell them online, a catalog site is the solution for you. It allows you to create detailed product sheets, add attractive images and provide all the information needed to arouse your customers' interest. What's more, you can generate interaction with your customers or prospects by allowing them to request further information or leave comments on the products they're interested in.
services.website-creation.catalog-title: Catalog Site: Showcase your products without selling them online
services.website-creation.contact-togeth: Don't hesitate to contact me now to discuss your website design project. I'm available to answer all your questions and provide you with a prompt response. Together, we'll turn your vision into reality and create a unique website that will help you grow your business and strengthen your online image. Take the first step towards your online success today!
services.website-creation.develop-activi: Develop your business and your image by creating your own website
services.website-creation.e-commerce-des: If you want to develop your business and increase your sales on the web, the creation of an e-commerce site is a must. With a well-designed e-commerce site, you'll be able to sell your products online securely and easily for your customers. With an intuitive ordering process, user-friendly shopping cart and secure payment options, you'll offer your customers an exceptional online shopping experience. Whether you sell physical products or digital services, an e-commerce site will enable you to reach a wider audience and increase your revenues.
services.website-creation.shine-descript: The creation of a website is an essential element in promoting your activity, your products or your company in an effective and captivating way. It's like an interactive business card, enabling your customers or prospects to discover what you have to offer in an attractive and engaging way.
services.website-creation.shine-title: Make your online presence shine with a customized website
services.website-creation.showcase-descr: A showcase site is the ideal option for presenting your business in a professional way. It provides a platform for showcasing your products, services and expertise. Think of it as an open window onto your business, where your customers can discover your world and learn more about what you have to offer. With an attractive design and fluid navigation, your showcase site will be the perfect tool to impress your visitors and entice them to find out more about your offerings.
services.website-creation.showcase-title: Showcase site: Present your business in a
